definition: root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)

sentences.english: As Morgan rightly observes, here is the prototype of the self-governing American township.
sentences.chinese: 摩尔根说得对，这是美洲市镇自治区的一种原型。

sentences.english: Molkenkur and Nussloch are in completely opposite directions.
sentences.chinese: 摩尔根疗养院和胡桃胡同是完全相反的方向。

definition: Friedrich Engels (1820-1895), socialist philosopher and one of the founder of Marxism

Joseph Needham (1900-1995), British biochemist and author of Science and Civilization in China
surname Althusser/Louis Pierre Althusser 路易·皮埃爾·阿爾都塞|路易·皮埃尔·阿尔都塞[Lu4 yi4 · Pi2 ai1 er3 · A1 er3 dou1 sai1] (1918-1990), Marxist philosopher
